rules_text:
Flying, trample
[i]Fiery Temper[/i] – Whenever Jill, Fiery Dracoknight or another creature you control is dealt damage, she gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
[i]Lead The Charge [/i]– Whenever Jill attacks, if her power is greater than her base power, other attacking creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the difference.
